    • Method Detail

      • addCollidingMover

        public void addCollidingMover(Mover mover)
        This methode lets you add a Mover that will be in this collision engine. When you add a mover it will collid with all the tiles in the world.
        Parameters:
        mover - A Mover class or a extend of it.

      • detect

        public boolean detect(Mover mover)
        This methode will detect if a Mover is overlapping with the tiles
        Parameters:
        mover - A Mover class or a extend of it.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the mover is overlapping

      • detect

        public boolean detect(Mover mover,
                      int actorLeft,
                      int actorRight,
                      int actorTop,
                      int actorBottom)
        This methode will detect if a Mover is overlapping with the tiles
        Parameters:
        mover - A Mover class or a extend of it.
        actorLeft - The far most left x position of the Mover.
        actorRight - The far most right x position of the Mover.
        actorTop - The far most top y position of the Mover.
        actorBottom - The far most bottom y position of the Mover.
        Returns:

      • getActorBottom

        Returns:

      • getCollidingTiles

        public java.util.List<Tile> getCollidingTiles(int top,
                                              int left,
                                              int right,
                                              int bottom,
                                              int midX,
                                              int midY,
                                              boolean addNoneSolid)
        This methode will get all the tiles at the different x and y position
        Parameters:
        top - The far most top y position
        left - The far most left x position
        right - The far most right x position
        bottom - The far most bottom y position
        midX - The middle x position
        midY - The middle y position
        Returns:
        Returns a list of tiles that are located on those positions.

      • getCollidingTiles

        public java.util.List<Tile> getCollidingTiles(Mover mover,
                                              boolean addNoneSolid)
        Getting the colliding Tiles from the collision engine
        Parameters:
        mover - A Mover class or a extend of it.
        addNoneSolid - If true it also add tiles that are not solid to the list
        Returns:
        A List of overlapping tiles.

      • removeCollidingActor

        public void removeCollidingActor(Mover mover)
        This methode will remove the Mover from the collision engine
        Parameters:
        mover - A Mover class or a extend of it.

      • resolve

        public boolean resolve(Mover mover,
                       Tile tile)
        This methode will resolves the overlapping.
        Parameters:
        mover - A Mover class or a extend of it.
        tile - A Tile class or a extend of it.
        Returns:
        Returns a true if the overlap was resolved.

      • update

        public void update()
        This methode must be called every update of the game. Else the collision will not apply correctly
